document.full_text: nasa administrator charlie bolden said on thursday he was "really happy" that recuperating representative gabrielle giffords was in florida to watch shuttle endeavour's launch on friday.
document.title: nasa chief says giffords is feisty, fired up
lines_and_colors: nasa administrator charlie bolden said on thursday he was "really happy" that recuperating representative gabrielle giffords was in florida to watch shuttle endeavour's launch on friday.
